item.title: By: Brian
item.dc:creator: Brian
item.content:encoded:
While the new date type largely resolves the date limits in datetime, it is often useable for much of my work. I often need to store BC dates, which is still outside of the range.

One way that I get around this is to use an offset value, but this has been the source of some difficult bugs and makes it difficult to maintain.

Are there any better alternatives?
